item.title: Word Cloud
item.description:
• Read a photo file of the portrait and grabbed the outline of the portrait;
  • Segmented the text into words and determined the word size according to the word frequency;
  • Designed the user interface to choose photos and text file in PC, as well as the number of words user wants to display;
  • Generated a word cloud, in which the words are in the outline of a portrait and the size of words are correspondent to their frequency
